page.title: 17DARLINGTON NEWSPAPERS
page.content: Darlington is a newspaper town. They produce the Darlington & Stockton Times,Northern Echo and the Evening Despatch. MON. 3 JUN 1985-Government plans big revision of Welfare State. Durham Cricketers beat Northumberland by 121 runs. TUES. 4 JUN-Rescue Workers fighting against time to reach a man trapped 50ft in a well on the Isle of Wight. WED. 5 JUN-Most of the victims at the Bradford City Football Ground were trapped at the back of the stand. THURS. 6 JUN-Firemen free two women after a horrific head-on car smash at Rushyford. English Soccer Clubs banned from playing abroad after the Brussels disaster. FRI. 7 JUN-A Darlington mother saves her four children from their blazing home.
